Package com.bitplan.javafx

core com.bitplan.javafx library classes with e.g.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseModifier<T>
    Base class for Modifying via views
    BasePresenter<T>
    Base Presenter class
    ConstrainedGridPane
    a GridPane with Column and RowConstraints
    ExceptionController
    Controller for ExceptionHandling
    GenericApp
    Generic Application
    GenericControl
    generic wrapper for JavaFX controls
    GenericDialog
    Generic Dialog
    GenericPanel
    a generic Panel
    ImageButton
    a button with two Image States
    ImageSelector<T>
    select an image from a list of images
    JavaFxI18n  
    JFXML
    FXML loader utility that can integrate between the platform independent Application (App) concept and FXML
    JFXStopWatch
    as Stop Watch
    JFXWizard
    a generic Wizard based on the controls FX Wizard which needs some tweaks to work properly as of 2017-08
    JFXWizardPane
    a page in a wizard
    LoginDialog
    Login Dialog
    Main
    generic Main class
    SampleApp
    create a sample App
    TaskLaunch<T>
    this is a utility task to launch tasks with lambda expressions
    WaitableApp
    Waitable Application that does not need launch
    XYTabPane
    this is a pane that has a tabular setup for TabPanes - a vertical one to select the corresponding horizontal tabpane this way each tab can be addressed as an x/y coordinate in table (but be aware this doesn't have to be a full matrix some rows might be shorter than others although a nice layout calls for same lenght rows e.g. with help tabs at the same position for each row.

Package com.bitplan.javafx Description

core com.bitplan.javafx library classes with e.g. WaitableApp, SampleApp GenericApp, GenericDialog, GenericPanel, GenericControl
